name: Navy & Stone Tiger Lily
description: This pair of handmade Darlingtonia Moccasins features a navy blue body, stone grat flowers and matching insole with natural colored lacing available in women’s whole sizes 5-11. Material: These moccasins are made of suede leather, which will stretch and shape to your foot with wear. They come with a soft cushioned 3/8 inch (1 cm) thick insole made from a super comfy eco-friendly closed cell foam. These moccasins are softsoled, which means they have no hard sole only leather. The bottom of the shoes is the same leather as the rest of the shoe. Have a look at a few photos on my website. The color of your moccasins may vary slightly from your computer screen. Please be aware the dye used to color the suede may stain your feet or socks, especially if they become wet (there’s no way around this, and it drives me crazy too!) This normally goes away over time. Method of Construction: All Darlingtonia moccasins are sewn using a completely manual antique Singer 29k sewing machine equipped with a foot treadle. All holes punched and pattern pieces cut are done one at a time by hand. Using needle & thread along with leather cement each pair of moccasins comes together and gets laced up using cotton cording. Turnaround Time: For my current turnaround time please visit my News & Updates page. Sizing: Please use my sizing chart to determine which size will fit you best. Please feel free to contact me with any questions!

name: Navy Bow Belt
description: This Darlingtonia Bow Belt is made using a dark navy blue suede leather & is created custom to your measurements. It fastens with 2 rows of snaps & can be adjusted one inch larger than your given measurement. When measuring your waist I recommend doing so over the garment you plan on wearing under your belt. Color: The dye used to color the suede used to make this bow belt may transfer to garments if exposed to moisture. Also take caution to avoid the leather from rubbing roughly against light colored garments. The color you see on your computer screen may vary slightly from the color of the product. Time Frame: For my current turnaround time please visit my News & Updates page. Note: This belt is not meant to hold any garment on or up, it is purely decorative. The snap fasteners should not be relied on under strain. Returns & Exchanges: Shop with confidence! If you are not completely satisfied with your bow belt return it for a full refund or exchange it for a new size or color within 7 days of receiving your belt in the mail. Also if your bow belt becomes compromised due to manufacturer error within the first 30 days I will replace it free of charge & pay for return shipping.

The bottom of the shoes is the same leather as the rest of the shoe. Have a look at a few photos on my website. The color of your moccasins may vary slightly from your computer screen. Please be aware the dye used to color the suede may stain your feet or socks, especially if they become wet (there’s no way around this, and it drives me crazy too!) This normally goes away over time. Method of Construction: All Darlingtonia moccasins are sewn using a completely manual antique Singer 29k sewing machine equipped with a foot treadle. All holes punched and pattern pieces cut are done one at a time by hand. Using needle & thread along with leather cement each pair of moccasins comes together and gets laced up using cotton cording. Turnaround Time: For my current turnaround time please visit my News & Updates page. Sizing: Please use my sizing chart to determine which size will fit you best. Please feel free to contact me with any questions!

name: White Bow Belt
description: This Darlingtonia Bow Belt is made using a bright white suede leather & is created custom to your measurements. It fastens with 2 rows of snaps & can be adjusted one inch larger than your given measurement. When measuring your waist I recommend doing so over the garment you plan on wearing under your belt. Color: The color you see on your computer screen may vary slightly from the color of the product. Time Frame: For my current turnaround time please visit my News & Updates page. Note: This belt is not meant to hold any garment on or up, it is purely decorative. The snap fasteners should not be relied on under strain. Returns & Exchanges: Shop with confidence! If you are not completely satisfied with your bow belt return it for a full refund or exchange it for a new size or color within 7 days of receiving your belt in the mail. Also if your bow belt becomes compromised due to manufacturer error within the first 30 days I will replace it free of charge & pay for return shipping.
